description:
He makes every mic a boom mic!

BOOMBOX 2: ZEGENDS NEVER DIE includes the Pro-Gamer Ziggs Skin and the following three songs/levels for Hextech Mayhem: A League of Legends Story:

League of Legends - Phoenix (ft. Cailin Russo and Chrissy Costanza)
League of Legends - Legends Never Die (ft. Against The Current)
League of Legends - RISE (ft. The Glitch Mob, Mako, and The Word Alive)
name: BOOMBOX 2: ZEGENDS NEVER DIE
